name: Mountainflyers 80 Ltd.
about: Mountain Flyers 80 Ltd., established in 1980 at Bern Airport and expanded to Grenchen Airport in April 2018, is a premier flight school specializing in helicopter pilot training. Our core business includes a full range of training programs, from trial lessons to commercial and private pilot licenses, as well as instrument flying, night flight training, and type ratings. We boast an extensive fleet featuring the Robinson R22, Robinson R44, Airbus Helicopters H125, Bell 505 Jet Ranger X, and the luxurious Leonardo AW109SP. In addition to aviation training, we offer scenic tours, film flights, and external sling load operations training. Our facilities also host hangar events and team gatherings. With a strong focus on comprehensive training and exceptional service, Mountain Flyers 80 Ltd. is a renowned name in helicopter aviation, committed to excellence in pilot education and aerial services.
